# getNodeEnv

give NODE_ENV value or given fallback value.

import:
```typescript copy
import { getNodeEnv } from '@fullstacksjs/toolbox'
```

usage:
```typescript copy
getNodeEnv(fallback)
```

example:
```typescript copy
// FOO=foo BAR=bar node
getEnv<TEnvKey>('FOO');        // foo
getEnv<TEnvKey>('BAR');        // undefined
getEnv<TEnvKey>('BAR', 'bar'); // bar
```
